abstract: Nina Burleigh reviews memoir The Hostage's Daughter: A Story of Family, Madness, and the Middle East by Sulome Anderson.

headline.main: Terry Anderson’s Daughter Investigates His 1985 Kidnapping

keywords.value: The Hostage's Daughter: A Story of Family, Madness, and the Middle East (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: In “The Hostage’s Daughter,” Sulome Anderson investigates the 30-year-old mystery of who really kidnapped her father and why....
lead_paragraph: In “The Hostage’s Daughter,” Sulome Anderson investigates the 30-year-old mystery of who really kidnapped her father and why.
